bugtrap03.bugdomain

Class Subsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.bugdomain.AbstractSystem
      • bugtrap03.bugdomain.Subsystem

  • public class Subsystem
extends AbstractSystem
    This class is a subclass of abstract system (versionID, name, description and Childs list). This type also contains a bug report PList, containing the bug reports linked to this subsystem.
    Author:
    Group 03

      This constructor makes an element of the class subsystem, using it's superclass, AbstractSystem, constructor.

      BugReport addBugReport(User creator, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies)
      This method creates and adds a bug report to the list of associated bugReports of this subsystem
      Subsystem cloneSubsystem(AbstractSystem parent)
      Returns a copy of the current subsystem, using the same versionID, name, description and parent, but with a removal of the bug reports addressed to this subsystem.
      purecollections.PList<BugReport> getAllBugReports()
      This method returns all the bug reports associated with this Subsytem
      purecollections.PList<BugReport> getBugReportList()
      This method returns the list of bug reports of this subsystem
      java.lang.String getDetails()
      this method implements the abstract method from abstract system to return a string of details belonging to this subsystem.
      protected AbstractSystem getParent()
      This is a getter for the set parent of the Subsystem;
      protected boolean isValidParent(AbstractSystem parent)
      This function checks or the given parent isn't one of subsystem's own child

      • Subsystem

        public Subsystem(VersionID version,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 AbstractSystem parent)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This constructor makes an element of the class subsystem, using it's superclass, AbstractSystem, constructor.
        Parameters:
        version - The versionID (of that type) of this element.
        name - The string name for this element.
        description - The string description of this element.
        parent - The parent (a Project or Subsystem) of this element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the String arguments is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the version id is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parent is invalid for this subsystem
        See Also:
        AbstractSystem.AbstractSystem(VersionID, String, String), isValidParent(AbstractSystem)

        This function checks or the given parent isn't one of subsystem's own child
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true is the given parent isn't the subsystem's own child

      • addBugReport

        public BugReport addBugReport(User creator,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              PermissionException
        This method creates and adds a bug report to the list of associated bugReports of this subsystem
        Parameters:
        creator - The issuer that wants to create the bug report
        title - The title of this bugReport
        description - The description of this bug report
        dependencies - The dependencies of the bug report
        Returns:
        the created bug report
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If BugReport(creator, title, description, dependencies, this) fails
        PermissionException - If the creation of a BugReport fails.
        See Also:
        BugReport.BugReport(bugtrap03.bugdomain.usersystem.User, String, String, PList, Subsystem)

      • cloneSubsystem

        public Subsystem cloneSubsystem(AbstractSystem parent)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a copy of the current subsystem, using the same versionID, name, description and parent, but with a removal of the bug reports addressed to this subsystem.
        Returns:
        the clone of the subsystem
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the VersionID is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the string arguments is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parent is invalid
        See Also:
        Subsystem(VersionID, String, String, AbstractSystem)

        getDetails in class AbstractSystem
        Returns:
        a string of details
